post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
Looking for volunteering Java enthusiasts:

I am administering an open source project, which was released last year but has not been maintained actively since then.

The project is about managing XML data, or XML database management (see http://xdbms.sourceforge.net/) and introduces lots of latest technologies.

If you are interested in taking this project up to the next level, leave a note or email me at khboo@hotmail.com
post.title: Open Source Java developer for a SourceForge project
